UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity analysis of thanatin, a 21-residue inducible insect defense peptide with sequence homology to frog skin antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1996;93:1221-1225
Literature.Author: Fehlbaum P, Bulet P, Chernysh S, Briand JP, Roussel JP, Letellier L, Hetru C, Hoffmann JA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aerococcus viridans(MIC=0.6-1.2µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=2.5-5µM),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=0.6-1.2µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=20-40µM),Staphylococcus aureus(no activity data),Pediococcus acidilactici(no activity data),Escherichia coli D22(MIC=20-40µM),Escherichia coli D31(MIC=20-40µM),Escherichia coli 1106(no activity data),Salmonella typhimurium(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae(no activity data),Enterobacter cloacae(no activity data),Pectobacterium carotovorum(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(no activity data),Neurospora crassa(MIC=0.6-1.2µM),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=2.5-5µM),Fusarium haematococcum(MIC=1.2-2.5µM),Trichoderma viride(MIC=1.2-2.5µM),Alternaria brassicicola(MIC=2.5-5µM),Fusarium culmorum(MIC=0.6-1.2µM),Ascochyta pisi(MIC=1.2-2.5µM),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=5-10µM)
